mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO vip( business_id ,business_name ,vip_name ,vip_phone ,vip_company ,vip_sex ,created_at ,updated_at ,vip_postion ,vip_birthday ,vip_phone2 ,hobby ,detest ,tag) VALUES
(#{item.businessId} ,#{item.businessName} ,#{item.vipName} ,#{item.vipPhone} ,#{item.vipCompany} ,#{item.vipSex} ,NOW() ,NOW() ,#{item.vipPostion} ,#{item.vipBirthday} ,#{item.vipPhone2} ,#{item.hobby} ,#{item.detest} , #{item.tag})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE vip_name = VALUES(vip_name) ,vip_phone = VALUES(vip_phone) ,vip_company = VALUES(vip_company) ,vip_sex = VALUES(vip_sex) ,updated_at = VALUES(updated_at) ,vip_postion = VALUES(vip_postion) ,vip_birthday = VALUES(vip_birthday) ,vip_phone2 = VALUES(vip_phone2) ,hobby = VALUES(hobby) ,detest = VALUES(detest) ,tag = VALUES(tag)
